pcf.api

Class Location

  • pcf.api.Location
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.commons.entity.BundleProvider

    public class Location
implements com.guidewire.commons.entity.BundleProvider
    The base Gosu class for all PCF Location derived classes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String Id
      Gets the id
      boolean InEditMode
      Returns true if the location is in edit mode, false otherwise. Note: This does not tell you if a particular widget is editable, only that the current location is in edit mode, and therefore may commit its bundle.

      • Fields inherited from class com.guidewire.commons.entity.BundleProvider

        Bundle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Takes out of edit mode, not saving changes
      void commit()
      Saves changes and takes out of edit mode. If the commit fails, a runtime excpetion is guaranteed to be thrown.
      Object loadFromDB(Object bean)
      Reloads a bean from the database, importing it into the current locations bundle.
      void startEditing()
      Puts into edit mode, making committable/cancelable changes to data possible

    • Field Detail

      • Id

        String Id
        Gets the id

      • InEditMode

        boolean InEditMode
        Returns true if the location is in edit mode, false otherwise. Note: This does not tell you if a particular widget is editable, only that the current location is in edit mode, and therefore may commit its bundle.

    • Method Detail

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Takes out of edit mode, not saving changes

      • commit

        void commit()
        Saves changes and takes out of edit mode. If the commit fails, a runtime excpetion is guaranteed to be thrown.

      • loadFromDB

        Object loadFromDB(Object bean)
        Reloads a bean from the database, importing it into the current locations bundle.
        Parameters:
        bean -
        Returns:

      • startEditing

        void startEditing()
        Puts into edit mode, making committable/cancelable changes to data possible
